projects.description: Designed and implemented a cutting-edge web application utilizing Python, Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS to seamlessly interpret and visually present results from Cppcheck. This project not only showcases my technical expertise but also demonstrates my ability to deliver intuitive user experiences and leverage modern technologies for real-world applications.

Cybernet AI is a cutting-edge, AI-powered cybersecurity platform designed to revolutionize digital security. At its core, it excels in document-based question and answer capabilities, but goes far beyond with an extensive suite of advanced tools, including port scanning, exploit search, password generation, data breach monitoring, and more. This comprehensive solution empowers organizations to stay ahead of emerging threats while streamlining security management with state-of-the-art, AI-driven technology.

I developed an engaging web application that showcases characters from my favorite manga, Dragon Ball. Users can effortlessly browse through a variety of characters, access detailed character pages, and search for specific characters by name. This project highlights my skills in web development and my passion for creating user-friendly experiences.

The giss_script_soft is a software application that allows users to upload, manipulate, and view both NetCDF and GeoTIFF files on an interactive Leaflet map. The purpose of this software is to enhance the analysis of NetCDF files by focusing on specific data within a NetCDF file using a two-dimensional map, facilitating the execution of related NetCDF scripts in an easy, interactive manner, and enabling users to view the output of the NetCDF files.

This project is a dynamic web application designed to foster meaningful connections between users around the world, whether for friendship or romance. The platform allows users to create profiles, explore others' profiles, and engage in meaningful interactions based on shared interests and proximity. The primary goal is to transition online conversations into real-world connections by offering a unique way for users to suggest locations or meeting places to one another.

I developed a powerful web application that empowers users to effortlessly create, edit, and manage their favorite recipes. Built using a modern tech stack including React for a responsive user interface, Tailwind CSS for sleek and intuitive design, Express for robust server-side functionality, and PostgreSQL for efficient data management, this application not only enhances the user experience but also demonstrates a strong understanding of full-stack development.

I have successfully developed and deployed a captivating web application, akin to the user experience offered by Netflix. This cutting-edge creation leverages a dynamic blend of technologies, including Youtube's API, Magic Link, Next.js, and other innovative tools. Currently, I am actively involved in further refining and enhancing its functionalities.

I have successfully delivered an impressive CRUD application, serving as an exclusive open forum for Maryland students and alumni. This cutting-edge platform empowers users to create, edit, and delete their own posts, while also engaging with a diverse range of threads on various topics. Leveraging Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and a secure MySQL backend, I have crafted a seamless and visually captivating user interface. With strong skills in frontend development, backend implementation, and database management, this project showcases my ability to create innovative, user-centric applications with a keen focus on data security and exceptional user experience.

Created an innovative lightweight web application designed to help users discover local coffee spots. This user-friendly platform not only showcases nearby cafes but also incorporates a unique upvote feature, allowing users to share their favorites and foster community engagement. Leveraging modern web technologies, I crafted an efficient and intuitive interface, enhancing user experience while promoting local businesses.

I've developed and published a user-friendly GUI application for scanning remote system ports and detecting vulnerabilities. It includes built-in search functionality for finding specific CVEs and supports comprehensive IPv4 address scans. Integration with CVE databases provides insights into affected software products and exploit methods. My project delivers an effective tool for enhancing security on remote systems.

I led the development of a cutting-edge web application that delivers real-time insights on crime and COVID-19 cases in Baltimore City. Through visually captivating maps, heatmaps, and graphs, users can effortlessly explore and analyze data. Leveraging React, Material UI, Leaflet, and Graph.js on the front-end, and SQLAlchemy with Flask on the back-end, I ensured a seamless user experience with secure and efficient data management. This project showcases my expertise in full-stack development, UI/UX design, and delivering impactful solutions for complex data-driven challenges.

Created a very simple web app known as the Party Finder Web App, a dynamic platform designed to showcase various parties and events happening across the United States. Built with React and connected to a PostgreSQL database, this app allows users to easily explore events by location, featuring unique URLs for each location detail page.

In my application for the Code Path Advanced Web Development course, I developed a robust feature set allowing users to seamlessly add, delete, and edit creator profiles. This project showcased my ability to build intuitive, dynamic web applications and played a crucial role in my acceptance into the advanced course. It not only demonstrated my technical proficiency but also my commitment to creating user-centric solutions.

Vue Forum is a dynamic online platform powered by Vue.js, designed to facilitate collaboration and knowledge-sharing among Vue.js enthusiasts. It provides a vibrant community where users can connect, learn, and grow together. With its user-friendly interface and responsive design, Vue Forum offers an intuitive experience across devices. Engage in discussions, ask questions, and gain valuable insights from fellow members. Join the Vue Forum community to explore, contribute, and expand your understanding of Vue.js and related topics.

projects.projectName: Connect Four Within The C Kernel
projects.description: I developed a custom Kernel Module for an exciting game of Connect Four, allowing users to play against a computer opponent. It features a reset option, selectable game pieces, and a robust win/lose/draw checking mechanism. To ensure thread safety, I implemented a mutex lock system, enabling seamless operation even with multiple concurrent users. This project highlights my expertise in low-level programming, game development, and concurrent systems, showcasing my ability to deliver engaging and secure solutions.

The QT Password Generator is a sleek and user-friendly GUI application developed using the Qt framework. With its intuitive interface, users can effortlessly generate strong and secure passwords. The application allows customization of password criteria, including length and character types. It employs a robust randomization algorithm to ensure each password is unique and difficult to guess. Users can easily copy generated passwords to the clipboard and benefit from a password strength indicator. The lightweight and cross-platform nature of the application make it a convenient tool for protecting sensitive information across various operating systems.
